entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 1:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Temperature: 5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 59 %
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: WSW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High plus 2. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain near noon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
